title: Man Supervillain
description:
A man who wields abilities beyond those of ordinary people who, unlike their nemesis the Superhero, uses their powers for evil. 

Google's design is similar to that of Mr. Sinister from the X-Men Marvel comics.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man supervillain emoji embodies menace with a dramatic flair, sporting a black cape that flows with glossy 3D shading and soft rounded edges. His expression, often a stern or determined gaze, is rendered with subtle gradients that hint at hidden power and grand, world-domination schemes. This emoji, as seen on Apple devices, is perfect for conveying a sense of playful or mock evil, or when feeling particularly ambitious and ready to conquer any challenge.
